description: Change your pay wall brother, you expect us to pay for something you cant even test....Dont waste your Work on greed and agraunce brother...most people dont mind giving money for a qaulity product but if you cant test it your app is not going to reach its full potenial...Tip From the Humbel Baker...give us a free trial...be as giving as you can my friend...you sound very intelligent but havent worked how fake money is yet...God Bless
